name: neki
description: Neki theme. Dark theme with Palenight/Panda themes inspirations

scripts.version:update: LAST_VERSION=$(npm pkg get version | sed 's/"//g') && npm run changelog && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: ðŸŒ± update to v'$LAST_VERSION && git tag v$LAST_VERSION
scripts.version:tag: LAST_VERSION=$(npm pkg get version | sed 's/"//g') && git tag v$LAST_VERSION
scripts.version:patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run version:update
scripts.version:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run version:update
scripts.version:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run version:update
